title: Desperately Seeking Deasley (N284 Buchner Gold Coin)
author: RFResnick

posts.post_title: Desperately Seeking Deasley (N284 Buchner Gold Coin)
posts.post_content:
Greetings. Posting here has done wonders in the past, so I'm trying again:

I am eagerly seeking the 1887 N284 Buchner Gold Coin card of New York Giants catcher Pat Deasley. Raw or graded, it doesn't matter to me!

Please let me know if you have one to sell -- or if you know somebody who does. Many thanks! -- Rick
